screenshots.description: Pre-execution checkpoint showing unauthenticated landing page
screenshots.observations: Landing page shows 'Create Your First Campaign' button and 'Sign in to save progress' - no API calls made

screenshots.description: Step 1 evidence - Landing page without API integration
screenshots.observations: Static content only, no GET /api/campaigns call on page load

screenshots.description: Step 1 breakthrough - After authentication shows dynamic content
screenshots.observations: Page shows 'Your Campaigns' with 16 campaigns, GET /api/campaigns successful

screenshots.description: Step 3 evidence - Campaign creation form with test data
screenshots.observations: Form shows test data: 'Milestone2Test - DynamicCampaign2025', 'Zara the Mystic Warrior', 'Eldoria Realm...'

screenshots.description: CRITICAL FAILURE - AI content shows hardcoded 'Shadowheart' instead of user data
screenshots.observations: Game content contains 'Shadowheart opened her eyes' instead of 'Zara the Mystic Warrior'

findings.description: Landing page does NOT call GET /api/campaigns on initial load
findings.impact: Shows static content for unauthenticated users

findings.description: After authentication, page DOES call GET /api/campaigns and shows dynamic content
findings.impact: Dynamic content works for authenticated users with existing campaigns

findings.description: Campaign creation form accepts and persists test data correctly

test_data.setting: Eldoria Realm where crystal magic flows through ancient forests

findings.description: POST /api/campaigns successfully creates campaign with user data
AI-generated game content shows hardcoded 'Shadowheart' instead of user's custom character 'Zara the Mystic Warrior'
findings.expected: Game content should reference 'Zara the Mystic Warrior'
findings.actual: Game content shows 'Shadowheart opened her eyes, a grim satisfaction settling over her'
findings.impact: Complete AI content personalization failure - user data not integrated into game narrative
findings.priority: ðŸš¨ CRITICAL - STOP and fix immediately

critical_issues_found.issue: Landing page static content for unauthenticated users
critical_issues_found.description: Landing page does not call GET /api/campaigns on load, shows static 'Create Your First Campaign' regardless of user state
critical_issues_found.action: Implement API call on page load to check user authentication and campaign state

critical_issues_found.issue: AI content generation not using campaign data
critical_issues_found.description: Game content shows hardcoded 'Shadowheart' instead of user's custom character 'Zara the Mystic Warrior'
critical_issues_found.action: Fix AI service integration to use actual campaign data instead of hardcoded content
critical_issues_found.console_errors: None - AI service not receiving campaign context properly

working_correctly.evidence: Campaign created successfully with ID: VoWlaaQFeidRUjBj1Z8e

working_correctly.functionality: Form data persistence through multi-step wizard
working_correctly.evidence: Test data maintained through all steps: 'Milestone2Test - DynamicCampaign2025', 'Zara the Mystic Warrior'

immediate_critical.action: Fix AI content generation to use campaign data instead of hardcoded 'Shadowheart'
Implement landing page API integration for unauthenticated state detection
